rows.label: tev001491_MSG0001
rows.name:
The more I hear about this scumbag,
the more I want to punch him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0002
rows.name:
Men like that need their asses kicked so they can
remember their proper place![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0003
rows.name: Oh. Hey, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0004
rows.name:
You spying on our girl chat? Not that I care,
but I worry you might not be able to handle it.
Men can be so delicate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_JNK0010
rows.name: Listen

rows.label: tev001491_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Irina you can handle it.

rows.label: tev001491_JNK0020
rows.name: Escape

rows.label: tev001491_SEL0021
rows.name: Flee in terror.

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0005
rows.name: Well, you've got pluck, at least. So I'll fill you in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0006
rows.name:
Oh, don't give me that scared little puppy look!
I'd actually like to get your opinion on this.
No one's going to hurt you. ...Probably.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0007
rows.name:
So one of our fellow BLADEs has been putting the
moves on this girl here for a while now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0008
rows.name:
But then she found out he's been hitting on her friends,
too. He's even asked ME out for drinks a few times![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0009
rows.name:
She thought he really liked her, but it turns out he's
just after every girl with a pulse. What do you think
about men like that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_JNK0030
rows.name: Admire

rows.label: tev001491_SEL0031
rows.name: Fearlessly claim that he sounds like your kind of guy.

rows.label: tev001491_JNK0040
rows.name: Insult

rows.label: tev001491_SEL0041
rows.name: Say that he sounds like a despicable sleazebag.

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0010
rows.name: You're one of them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0011
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0012
rows.name:
Well, I'm sure the colonel knows how to deal with your
type, but that doesn't make me feel any better about
having someone like you on our team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0013
rows.name:
What you do on your own time is your business, 
but if you look sideways at any of our BLADE women,
I'll have you singing soprano for the rest of your life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0014
rows.name: You men are all the same. Pa-THETIC![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0015
rows.name:
I had a feeling you were a man of integrity.
Hell, I'd actually buy YOU a drink![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0016
rows.name:
But we gotta teach these jerks that we're not as stupid
as they seem to think.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0017
rows.name:
If they're gonna act like animals, maybe it's time we
showed 'em how Interceptors deal with unruly beasts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0018
rows.name:
Ah, perfect timing. We were just having some
emergency girl talk. You want to get in on this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0019
rows.name:
After all, outside of your team with the colonel,
there aren't all that many women in BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0020
rows.name:
It's rare that we get a chance to talk without having to
hold back because some dumb guy is hanging around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_JNK0050
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001491_SEL0051
rows.name: Tell Irina that you've yearned for some girl talk.

rows.label: tev001491_JNK0060
rows.name: Observe

rows.label: tev001491_SEL0061
rows.name:
Say that you've never seen Irina
hold back around anyone.

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0021
rows.name:
I know, right? Next time we'll have to do this at a bar
and talk all night long.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0022
rows.name:
Okay, so our girlfriend here? Well, one of our fellow
BLADEs has been putting the moves on her big time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0023
rows.name:
Ha! I'll give you that. Holding back has never been my
strong suit. Or any suit, actually.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0024
rows.name:
I'm just saying it's nice to speak freely, you know?
I mean, Gwin is a nice guy, but most of them can be
such obnoxious louts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0025
rows.name:
Anyway, it's about our girlfriend here. One of our
fellow BLADEs has been putting the moves on her lately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0026
rows.name:
But then she found out he's been hitting on her friends,
too. He's even asked ME out for drinks a few times![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0027
rows.name:
She thought he really liked her, but it turns out he's
just after every girl with a pulse. What a lowlife, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_JNK0070
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001491_SEL0071
rows.name: Claim that such behavior is despicable.

rows.label: tev001491_JNK0080
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: tev001491_SEL0081
rows.name: Say that you really go for the bad-boy type.

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0028
rows.name:
I know, right? You'd better watch out for creeps
like that yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0029
rows.name:
You're a lot cuter than I am, so I bet they're all over
you like a cheap suit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_JNK0090
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001491_SEL0091
rows.name: Promise to be careful.

rows.label: tev001491_JNK0100
rows.name: Object

rows.label: tev001491_SEL0101
rows.name: Insist that Irina is just as cute as you.

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0030
rows.name:
Good girl. And if anyone starts creeping on you,
come straight to me. All right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0031
rows.name: I'll show him what we Interceptors do to unruly beasts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0032
rows.name: Wh-what are you talking about! That's crazy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0033
rows.name:
Have you been drinking on the job or something?
You're not even making sense right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0034
rows.name:
Anyway, if a guy steps out of line, you tell me,
all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0035
rows.name: I'll show him what we Interceptors do to unruly beasts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0036
rows.name: Ooo-kay. Wow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0037
rows.name:
You say that with such certainly. It almost makes me
wonder if I'm overreacting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0038
rows.name:
Well, regardless, there's no shortage of creeps in
BLADE, so you gotta watch out for the bad ones.
Especially if you're into that sort of guy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001491_MSG0039
rows.name:
But if anyone steps out of line, make sure you come
straight to me. I'll show him what we Interceptors
do to unruly beasts.[ST:wait ]
